GENERAL AND ADMINISTRATIVE EXPENSE FOR MAINTAINING
AND OPERATING THE BRIDGES.

Coverdale and Colpitts, Consulting Engineers, New York City, have
estimated the general and administrative expense for maintaining and
operating bridge combinations as tabulated below. This tabulation is
herein reproduced for the purpose of ready reference—see Table 21.

MAINTENANCE, OPERATION AND INSURANCE FOR PROPOSED BRIDGE

Coverdale and Colpitts have also estimated the operating expenses for
each of the crossings in the program, and the tabulation of such expenses
for the operation, maintenance and insurance requirements for the proposed
Patapsco River Bridge are herein tabulated for ready reference. See
Table 22.

MAINTENANCE, OPERATION AND INSURANCE FOR PROPOSED TUNNEL

The following estimate of operating expenses for the proposed Patapsco
River Tunnel have been prepared by Mr. Ole Singstad, Consulting En-
gineer of New York City, in collaboration with J. E. Greiner Company,
and are herein tabulated in Table 23 for ready comparison with the main-

MAINTENANCE, OPERATION AND INSURANCE FOR PROPOSED BRIDGE

Coverdale and Colpitts have also estimated the operating expenses for
each of the crossings in the program, and the tabulation of such expenses
for the operation, maintenance and insurance requirements for the proposed
Patapsco River Bridge are herein tabulated for ready reference. See
Table 22.
